note:
Drummer with mr sterile Assembly- lives Te Whanganui-a-Tara/Wellington, employment history as nurse for most of working life..not currently, recovering occupational hazards, broad ears & easily bored.

Other interests: Music!!! in gamelan ensemble, leadlight glass art, sci-fi, writers like Graeber, Berger, Levi & Morton, plant based food, parent to kids, cat & grandkid, rewilding life & land, writing but rarely show it

he/him

#SonicPickMeUp: a project of musical gratitude
